name: odoo-mcp
description: MCP server for Odoo - exposes Odoo ERP operations to AI agents via Model Context Protocol
long_description: A comprehensive MCP server providing 34 tools for interacting with Odoo ERP systems. Includes CRUD operations, search capabilities, mail/chatter management, properties handling, workflow execution, report generation, and session management. Designed for AI agents to perform complex Odoo operations safely and efficiently.

tools.name: odoo_connect
tools.description: Authenticate and establish session with Odoo server

tools.name: odoo_search_read
tools.description: Search records with domain filters and return specified fields

tools.name: odoo_fields_get
tools.description: Get field definitions for a model

tools.name: odoo_check_access
tools.description: Check user access rights on models

tools.name: odoo_post_internal_note
tools.description: Post private internal note on record chatter

tools.name: odoo_post_public_message
tools.description: Post public message to followers (triggers notifications)

tools.name: odoo_manage_followers
tools.description: Add, remove, or list record followers

tools.name: odoo_add_attachment
tools.description: Create and attach file to a record

tools.name: odoo_complete_activity
tools.description: Mark activity as done or cancel

tools.name: odoo_get_activities
tools.description: Get activities by record or user

tools.name: odoo_read_properties
tools.description: Read dynamic properties in raw or simple format

tools.name: odoo_find_properties_field
tools.description: Discover properties field on a model

tools.name: odoo_get_property_definitions
tools.description: Get property definitions from parent model
